info.name: Nobel Gallery
info.longDescription:
Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities such as free WiFi, mini-bars, and soundproofing. Guests enjoy balconies with inner courtyard views, work desks, and parquet floors.

The modern restaurant serves international cuisine with vegetarian options. Breakfast includes continental, buffet, and gluten-free selections, featuring local specialties, fresh pastries, and fruits. Additional dining options include brunch, lunch, dinner, high tea, and cocktails.

Convenient Location: Located in Belgrade, the hotel is 7.5 mi from Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport. Nearby attractions include Temple of Saint Sava (17-minute walk), Belgrade Train Station (1.2 mi), and Belgrade Fair (1.2 mi). Surroundings offer an ice-skating rink and boating.

Guests appreciate the friendly staff, excellent service, and convenient location. Private check-in and check-out, 24-hour front desk, and full-day security ensure a comfortable stay.
